message.body: hey dan
sup
got your email
How was last night?
It went well, got tired quickly though
we danced a bit
how about you?
was good. things got crazy there and ended up driving all over. Never got together with Julie
haha, yikes
yeah it was nuts as we were leaving
the line outside rooneys was rough
but had a good time. ended up at efi's place
Oh yeah, haha
So, you were able to connect with her?
I kinda forgot about her, lol
I was texting alot last night
yeah we drove by there because my friends brother was there but it was too crowded
yea efi and her friend came out to the bar
nice
Julie was suppose to come out too but she didnt leave PA until after 12
Was her friend a guy or girl
Yeah, she said she was leaving to come and I was like, uhhh we already left
this guy brian, he works at the school with her
Oh okay, never met him
thats cool. if you go to amazon.com site you can preview some of the pages
ahhh
yeah, I may buy it
I just read her book on creating a life together
yeah I knew about the mission statement thing
I just thought that zings was kind of specific, whereas I thought it should be more vauge
yep
I think she's been thinking of this one project for awhile

yeah, she mentioned it at the meeting and how she drives by it all the time. I use to drive by it a lot too so I knew what property she was talking about. It's a cool spot, but I just don't think the developer is going to be down with it
You never know, but any proposal would have to be written so that we have some rights to the land legally
yeah, and I'm not sure I want to put my energy in an anvenue that may end up fruitless
We would need to set up a land trust and the developer wouldnt really have any interest in that as it would limit what they could do with the land
I think Zing mentioned something about it being undevelopeable, so that would cetainly help our case. If they donated the land to the non-profit they would get a tax write-off
Hmm
ah, ok so I just checked it out and typically you can deduct the fair market value of the property if donated to a 501(c)(3)
hmmm...well that could be a bargaining chip
Anyway, what's your turkey day look like?
heading over to my friends in elkton in an hour or so
Efi mentioned something about a party in philly
there's always a party in Philly
lol
yeah, I'm about to head on out to my Aunts
hit me up later if want
I'm pretty free after Thanksgiving
alright. will do. Have a good thanksgiving
ya'll too, I love that song, just heard it again...catch ya later
